Uses of Enum
net.finmath.marketdata.model.curves.CurveInterpolation.ExtrapolationMethod

Packages that use CurveInterpolation.ExtrapolationMethod
Package
Description
net.finmath.marketdata.model.curves
Provides interface specification and implementation of curves, e.g., interest rate curves like discount curves and forward curves.
net.finmath.parser
Contains classes for parsing files.
